channel.title: RuneFest..?
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone knows anybody that is going to runefest this year.. why? Just wondering what this is all about..
Mod Crow: There will be computers set up and dedicated to RuneScape but there’ll also be computers in the CM area for people to check out and sign up to their favourite fansites. There are also going to be some additional computers set up for something really special. They’ll be behind closed doors and give attendees the chance to try something a little bit different. I’m dying to tell you just what that entails but for now, my lips are sealed! ; )

item.title: RuneFest..?
item.dc:creator: @Agent_Jugz Agent Jugz
item.description:
@Agent_Jugz wrote:

I’m gonna go there, login to there computers; login on my rs account (because i got no computer at home, cause am tramp ofc), tell jagex im bored, download rsbot and bot my account.

By doing this Jagex will realise how shit there game is.

item.title: RuneFest..?
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Im going I live in the UK anyway so may aswell. Also I have a friend who wanted to go aswell. On the RuneFest forums though there was some guy from America paying $10k to go… I mean wow…

Here is some more stuff on RuneFest including what it could look like.

item.title: RuneFest..?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:7, topic:415132”]Its not about the fucking nerdy bullshit.

Just wondering wtf they are going to do… stellardawn beta?[/quote]
Lol Dw we are just trollin. (:

But no, I’m not going, would be nice to meet some of the owners in person during an event like that but I don’t have the time or the money to fly out there.

item.title: RuneFest..?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:4, topic:415132”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=517091.msg3755483#msg3755483 date=1316400615]
Lol people travel to the UK to dress up like a wizard and run around like a nerd?

[/quote]

I’m pretty sure everyone in the UK already is dressed up like a wizard.[/quote]

Haha. I think Jagex reads some of the shit posted on this site. Not too long ago MITB posted that Jagex told him to remove some stuff on this website.

What if a nerd goes on a rampage and tries to break the hosting computers?

Andrew Ferguson:

Dress up and act like a nerd in public? What could go wrong!

Act?

Read full topic
